document.full_text: the value of assets in state retirement systems fell by $641.3 billion to $2 trillion in 2009, the u.s. census bureau said in a report on thursday that showed the deep damage done to pension funds by the financial crisis.
document.title: state pension fund assets down $643.1 billion in 2009
lines_and_colors: the value of assets in state retirement systems fell by $641.3 billion to $2 trillion in 2009, the u.s. census bureau said in a report on thursday that showed the deep damage done to pension funds by the financial crisis.
